definition[0]: something that you have or something that happens which is good because it improves your life, helps you in some way, or makes you happy
example[0]: The dishwasher has been a real blessing!
example[1]: It’s a blessing no one was badly hurt.
definition[1]: someone’s approval or encouragement for a plan, activity, idea etc
example[2]: The Defense Department has given its blessing to the scheme.
example[3]: They were determined to marry, with or without their parents’ blessing.
definition[2]: protection and help from God, or words spoken to ask for this
